message: Cannot combine AUTOINCREMENT and multiple primary keys in SQLite.
details:
[16-May-2025 02:29:57 UTC] WordPress database error
 

MySQL query:

CREATE TABLE wp_wpcf7rl ( id MEDIUMINT(9) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, form_id INT(9) NOT NULL, date TIMESTAMP NOT NULL DEFAULT current_timestamp(), ip BIGINT NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY id (id), INDEX `form_id_ip` (`form_id`, `ip`) USING BTREE ) DEFAULT CHARACTER SET utf8mb4

Queries made or created this session were:

  1. Executing: BEGIN | (no parameters)
  2. Executing: ROLLBACK | (no parameters)
